pricing.pageDescription: Choose the plan that fits your garden. Aphylia is free forever with optional Plus features for serious plant parents.

hero.title: Simple, transparent pricing
hero.subtitle: Aphylia is built for plant lovers, not profit. Our core features are free and always will be. Plus is for those who want to go further.

free.name: Free
free.description: Everything you need to start your plant journey

plus.name: Plus
plus.description: For dedicated plant parents who want it all

philosophy.title: Why we keep Aphylia free
philosophy.p1: We believe plant care should be accessible to everyone.
philosophy.p1cont: Whether you're nurturing your first succulent or managing a thriving indoor jungle, you deserve tools that help you succeedâ€”without breaking the bank.
philosophy.p2start: That's why Aphylia's core features are
philosophy.p2end: . No trials, no hidden limits that make the app unusable. Just genuine, useful tools for plant lovers.
philosophy.p3answer: Running Aphylia costs real moneyâ€”servers, development, plant databases, identification systems. Plus lets passionate plant parents who want advanced features help us keep the lights on and continue building something special.
philosophy.p3note: Think of Plus as your way of supporting the Aphylia community while unlocking extra superpowers for your garden.

comparison.title: Compare plans in detail
comparison.subtitle: See exactly what you get with each plan

items.q: Can I use Aphylia completely free?
items.a: Absolutely! Our free tier includes up to 5 gardens with unlimited plants each, care reminders, the full plant encyclopedia, bookmark collections, and more. No credit card required.

items.q: What happens if I reach 5 gardens?
items.a: You'll see a friendly prompt to upgrade or manage your existing gardens. We never delete your gardens or plants. Your data is always safe.
Yes, cancel with one click from your settings. You'll keep Plus features until your billing period ends, then seamlessly return to Free.
Plus members can snap a photo of any plant and our system will identify the species and provide care recommendations. It's a powerful tool for discovering unknown plants.

bottomCta.title: Ready to grow with Aphylia?
bottomCta.subtitle: Start free and upgrade when you're ready. Your plants will thank you.

defaults.description: Discover, swipe and manage the perfect plants for every garden.

home.title: Aphylia
home.description: Swipe through curated species, unlock their lore, and save favorites in Aphylia's living encyclopedia.

search.title: Advanced plant search
search.description: Filter by color, season, rarity, and uses to pinpoint the right species for your next planting plan.

about.title: About Aphylia
about.description: Meet the founders, rituals, and creative ambition behind Aphylia's augmented plant lab.

contactSupport.title: Contact Aphylia support
contactSupport.description: Reach the team for product questions, onboarding help, or to report an issue.

contactBusiness.title: Contact Aphylia business team
contactBusiness.description: Start partnership, press, or enterprise deployment conversations with the core team.

download.title: Download the Aphylia PWA
download.description: Follow step-by-step install guides for iOS, Android, and desktop so every tester stays up to date.

blog.listDescription: Stories, product updates, and horticulture lessons from the Aphylia team.

terms.title: Aphylia terms & testing rules
terms.description: Review the internal usage guidelines that keep our private beta safe, secure, and respectful.

scan.signInDescription: Please log in to identify plants and save your scan history.
scan.newScanHint: Take a clear photo of a leaf, flower, or the whole plant for best results.
scan.identifyingHint: Our AI is analyzing your image. This usually takes a few seconds.
scan.noScansHint: Take a photo or upload an image of a plant to get started.
scan.resultDescription: Here's what we found based on your image.
scan.searchForPlant: Search for this plant in our encyclopedia
scan.deleteDescription: This will permanently remove this scan from your history. This action cannot be undone.
scan.classificationHintShort: Full Detail identifies cultivars like 'Brasil' or 'Pink Princess'
scan.notInDatabaseYet: This plant is not in our database yet
scan.notInDatabaseHint: Tap the button below to request this plant and we will review adding it.
scan.notInDatabaseRequest: Not in our database? Request it

errors.notAPlant: This doesn't appear to be a plant. Please try a different image.
errors.identifyFailed: Failed to identify plant. Please try again.

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Preferences
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can choose which cookies to accept.
cookieConsent.essentialDesc: Required for basic site functionality like authentication and preferences. These cannot be disabled.
cookieConsent.securityDesc: Google reCAPTCHA protects against spam and abuse. Loaded only when you accept cookies.
cookieConsent.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website. Your IP is anonymized.

gdpr.title: Data & Consent
gdpr.description: Manage your data and consent preferences under GDPR.
gdpr.exportDataDescription: Download all data we have about you in a machine-readable format.
gdpr.exportInfo: Your export will include your profile, gardens, plants, messages, friends, bookmarks, and all other personal data.
gdpr.exportSuccess: Your data has been exported successfully.
gdpr.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
gdpr.marketingConsentDescription: Receive occasional emails about new features and updates.

hero.title: Aphylia Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. Your privacy is important to us and we are committed to GDPR compliance.

contact.title: Questions about your data?
contact.subtitle: Contact us via the Contact page if you have any questions about how we handle your data or to exercise your GDPR rights.

privacy.title: Aphylia Privacy Policy & GDPR Rights
privacy.description: Learn how Aphylia protects your personal data and your GDPR rights including data access, export, and deletion.

prefs.pushTaskRemindersDesc: Watering, fertilizing, and plant care reminders
prefs.emailProductUpdatesDesc: Learn about new features and improvements
prefs.emailTipsAdviceDesc: Seasonal tips, plant care guides, and expert advice
prefs.emailCommunityDesc: Featured gardens, success stories, and community news
prefs.emailPromotionsDesc: Exclusive deals, discounts, and partner offers
prefs.securityEmailsNote: Note: Security-related emails (password changes, suspicious activity) cannot be disabled.
prefs.personalizationDescription: Control how we personalize your experience and use data to improve the app.
prefs.personalizedRecommendationsDesc: Get plant suggestions and content based on your interests and garden activity.
prefs.analyticsImprovementDesc: Allow anonymous usage data collection to help us improve the app experience.
prefs.privacyNote: We never sell your data. See our Privacy Policy for details on how we protect your information.
prefs.quickActionsDescription: Quickly adjust multiple settings at once.
prefs.optOutSuccess: Opted out of all non-essential data processing
prefs.quickActionsNote: You can re-enable individual settings at any time in the Notifications tab.
prefs.cookieDescription: Manage how we use cookies on your device.
prefs.cookieInfo: Essential cookies are required for basic functionality. Analytics cookies help us understand how you use the app.

legal.updateDescription: We have updated our legal documents. Please review and accept the new terms to continue using Aphylia.
legal.acceptanceNote: By clicking "I Accept", you agree to be bound by the updated terms. If you decline, your account will be blocked until you accept.
legal.updateFailed: Failed to save your acceptance. Please try again.
legal.consequencesTitle: If you decline, the following will happen:
legal.consequence1: Your account will be immediately blocked
legal.consequence2: You will be signed out and unable to log back in
legal.consequence3: You will lose access to all your data, gardens, and plants
legal.consequence4: To regain access, you must contact support
legal.reconsiderMessage: We encourage you to review the updated documents. If you have concerns, please contact our support team before declining.
legal.declinedMessage: Your account has been blocked because you declined the updated terms. Contact support if you wish to reactivate your account.

welcome.title: Welcome to Aphylia!
welcome.description: I'm your garden assistant. I will accompany you through this journey to make your garden grow and bloom into the most beautiful one!
welcome.subtitle: First, let's get to know each other and the environment where your garden will evolve.

setup.editLaterNote: You can always change these later in Settings.

location.title: Where are you located?
location.subtitle: This helps us provide local gardening advice
location.noResults: No cities found. Try a different search.
location.detectFailed: Unable to detect location. Please search manually.
location.geoNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser

gardenType.title: What plant living space interests you?
gardenType.subtitle: This helps us recommend the right plants for you

experience.title: What's your gardening level?
experience.subtitle: We'll adapt our advice to your expertise
experience.noviceDesc: I'm just starting my gardening journey
experience.intermediateDesc: I have some experience with plants

purpose.title: What is your purpose for your garden?
purpose.subtitle: We'll personalize your plant recommendations
purpose.eatDesc: Vegetables and fruits for my own consumption
purpose.variousDesc: As many various plants as possible

notificationTime.title: When should we remind you?
notificationTime.subtitle: Choose your preferred notification time
notificationTime.earlyDesc: 6:00 AM - Start the day with your plants
notificationTime.middayDesc: 2:00 PM - A break in your afternoon
notificationTime.afternoonDesc: 5:00 PM - Wind down with your garden

notifications.title: Stay on top of your garden
notifications.description: Enable notifications to get reminders about watering, fertilizing, and caring for your plants at the perfect time.

complete.title: You're all set!
complete.description: Your garden assistant is ready to help you grow the most beautiful plants. Let's start exploring!

settings.title: Garden Preferences
settings.description: Update your gardening preferences and notification settings.
settings.gardenTypeDescription: Where do you grow your plants?
settings.notificationTimeDescription: When should we send you reminders?
settings.notificationTimeHelper: Scheduled notifications will be sent at the same local time in your timezone ({{timezone}}).

profileActions.title: Get started
profileActions.subtitle: {{done}} of {{total}} completed
profileActions.allDoneSubtitle: You completed every action. Great job!
profileActions.createGardenDesc: Head to the Gardens page and start your very own garden.
profileActions.addPlant: Add a plant to your garden
profileActions.addPlantDesc: Open one of your gardens and add your first plant to it.
profileActions.addFriendDesc: Search for other gardeners and send them a friend request.
profileActions.completeProfileDesc: Add a bio to make your profile more personal.
profileActions.addBookmarkDesc: Save a plant you like to one of your bookmark lists.

emailVerification.title: Verify Your Email
emailVerification.description: We've sent a verification code to:
emailVerification.codeExpired: Code has expired. Please request a new one.
emailVerification.checkSpam: Check your spam folder if you don't see the email. The code is valid for 5 minutes.
emailVerification.invalidCode: Invalid verification code. Please check and try again.
emailVerification.expiredCode: This code has expired. Please request a new one.
